example.parse: (S (PUNC ") (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC علاقة) (NP (NOUN_PROP حمانا))) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاخوة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الخليجيين)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC عموما))) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الكويتيين)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC خصوصا)))))) (PUNC ,) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM قديمة))

arg.g: Hamana's relations with brothers from the Gulf
